youtube.title: How Doctors Correct Strabismus: Eye Surgery Explained
youtube.description: Discover the incredible process behind correcting strabismus (misaligned eyes). We break down the surgical techniques used to balance the eye muscles and restore perfect vision. Perfect for biology students and curious minds! Subscribe for more medical insights.
